summary.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

span.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含所有为特定对象。The contains all the objects for a particular . 访问的，使用属性。To access the of a , use the property. 使用如下方法， ，和来管理集合中的项。The uses methods such as , , and to manage the items in the collection. 使用方法来确定特定表 （由索引或名称指定） 是否在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a particular table (specified by either index or name) is in the collection. 若要从一个表导航到另一个，请使用或的属性访问其集合对象。To navigate from one table to another, use the or property of the to access its collection of objects. 此外可以使用属性的父/子关系中导航`DataTables`特别集合。You can also use the property to navigate through the parent/child relationships of the `DataTables` in a particular collection. ## Examples 在此示例中的第一个过程中检索的并输出每个表的每一行中的每列的值。The first procedure in this example retrieves the of a and prints the value of each column, in each row, of each table. 第二个过程创建一个新包含两个列，并将其添加到。The second procedure creates a new with two columns, and adds it to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的名称对象使用属性。You specify the name of the object by using the property. 如果您将添加到具有集合方法，传递任何自变量，该表指定默认名称，根据表已添加 （"Table1"、"Table2"等） 的顺序。If you add a to the collection with the method, passing no arguments, the table is given a default name, based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 若要获取的索引，使用方法。To get the index of a , use the method. > [!NOTE] > 返回`false`时两个或多个表具有相同的名称，但不同的命名空间。Returns `false` when two or more tables have the same name but different namespaces. 如果存在任何多义性，且只有一个表的表名称进行匹配时，不会成功调用。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a table name to exactly one table. ## Examples 下面的示例测试是否具有名称"供应商"的表中存在。The following example tests whether a table with the name "Suppliers" exists in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果名称存在与搜索字符串的大小写匹配，它返回的状态。If a name exists that matches the case of the search string, it is returned. 否则将执行不区分大小写搜索，并且如果匹配此搜索找到名称，则它返回的状态。Otherwise a case-insensitive search is performed, and if a name is found that matches this search, it is returned. 使用方法，以确定是否存在具有特定名称或索引的表。Use the method to determine whether a table with a specific name or index exists. ## Examples 下面的示例检索按名称从单个表。The following example retrieves a single table by name from the .
